resources.string:
"Or perhaps in Slytherin,
You'll make your real friends,
Those cunning folk use any means,
To achieve their ends"
Welcome to Slytherin House.\nSlytherin will help you on\nyour way to greatness.
Hmmm, So you are a wizard?\nBut do you have what it takes to be a Slytherin?\nSwipe right and let\'s test you!
